abstract: Stromal gastrointestinal tumors or GIST are undifferentiated mesenchymal tumors of gastrointestinal tract that showed characteristic c-kit expression. GIST are very rare in children and only 21 cases are reported in literature. The authors present a GIST arising in the stomach of a 7-year-old girl and revealed by severe anaemia. The patient underwent surgical resection and chemotherapy because of high-risk markers. Positive diagnosis and prognosis of paediatric GIST are discussed with literature data.
title: [Stromal gastrointestinal tumors in children: about a case].
